articles.content: Amer Sports (AS) stock pops after beating first quarter earnings expectations and lifting its full-year outlook. General Motors (GM) says it will halt exports of cars from the US to China amid ongoing trade tensions. Apple (AAPL) is in focus as iPhone exports from China to the US hit a 14-year low.
